Title: VBA Composite Controls Object Model
Description: VBA Composite Controls encapsulate complex event-driven interactions between ActiveX controls and other objects in Microsoft Office.  It's uses are limited only by the imagination, from binding controls together for updating, to creating unique user interfaces!
HomeWiki:
VBA Composite Control Object Model

VBA Composite Controls encapsulate complex event-driven interactions between ActiveX controls and other objects in Microsoft Office. It's uses are limited only by the imagination, from binding controls together for updating, to creating unique user interfaces!


Get Started using the VBA Composite Controls Object Model!
